info.name: Order Management
info.description: This API documentations is specified in a order management of an buffet restaurant

request.description: API endpoint for authenticating user with JWT token . And All the remaining requests must the `Authorization : Bearer` for accessing the API resources.
Get order based on Status : `occupied` and `finished` state

response.name: Get Order By Status finished state example
